mapper.select: SELECT * FROM cart_list WHERE user_id = #{userId} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: WITH seq_name AS ( SELECT pg_get_serial_sequence('public.cart_list','id') AS seq ), synced AS ( SELECT setval(seq, (SELECT COALESCE(MAX(id),0) FROM public.cart_list)) FROM seq_name ) INSERT INTO cart_list (user_id, is_login_user, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, TRUE, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) RETURNING id
mapper.update: UPDATE cart_list SET updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
